title: 服务器维护状态怎么取消
txt_content: [img]file:///D:\My Documents\Tencent Files\979426704\Image\Group\Image5\4`}JYQ0GGE50S[REE[PWOC8.png[/img]服务器正在维护状态，怎么取消？

replies.txt_content: 输入 /smode  就可以取消了

replies.author: xushihao
replies.txt_content: 如果是colormotd插件的话，在服务器里输 /smode 或在后台输 smode

replies.author: Saukiya
replies.txt_content:
输入/smode取消
以及输入/help colormotd查询相关指令

replies.author: 圣魔霸主
